title: Karthus can't talk ?
body: while i was playing a game as karthus a noticed that he wasn't speaking during the game and when i pressed his taunt he didn't said anything. Why ? Is it my computer or the game ? If it is the game i highly recommend fixing it immediately RIOT. If it is my computer please tell me what to do to fix it

replies.body: Must have been a bug. Karthus has some of the best lines I know if in the game
He's uh, been playing a lot of Pentakill gigs, and well, he's a bit hoarse now. D:
Got chills the first time I heard him
hahahaha i know what you mean. He turns you spine into ice

Hey! 

This is a known issue affecting Karthus and all of his skins. We're aware of the issue and are working on a fix. Thanks for the report!
Thank you for replying to my message. It means a lot knowing that riot is worrying about their players and their time

It's not your computer, i play Karthus a lot and since patch 6.1 i can tell you that Karthus / Pentakill karthus have been silent for me too. Which is kind of annoying since i bought the pentakill skin mostly for the rock speechlines
